Abbotsfield Park

Description
The park also plays to a number of events throughout the year, including the annual May Day Steam Rally, the Mayor's Bonfire and Silcock's Fair.

About Business Continuity

Description
Business Continuity Management (BCM) is an ongoing set of processes that will help your organisation anticipate, prepare for, prevent, respond to and recover from disruptions, whatever their source or scale and whatever part of your organisation they affect.

Accommodation certificates

Description
Any dwelling house is deemed fit for human habitation unless it fails to meet one or other of several requirements and by reason of that failure is not reasonably suitable for occupation.

Adopt a tree

Description
As part of the Green Streets Project we would like to offer residents with the opportunity to adopt their own street tree on the pavement outside of their house or a suitable commemorative tree to be planted within a park or open space.

Adoption support

Description
Once you have adopted, support for you and your child is still available. At Trafford Council we also offer support to birth relatives of children who are adopted or adults who have been adopted.
